name: Beardo Beard Oil
description: Nourishing beard oil enriched with natural ingredients for a soft, shiny, and itch-free beard.
details: Formulated with essential oils, this beard oil keeps your beard nourished and your skin itch-free while promoting healthy growth and shine.

name: Nivea Men Face Wash
description: Deep cleansing face wash designed to remove dirt, oil, and impurities for a fresh look.
details: This face wash gently exfoliates and cleanses skin, removing deep-seated impurities and excess oil without drying it out.

name: Beard Growth Oil + Vitamin C Serum Combo
description: Combo with Beard Growth Oil and Vitamin C Serum for complete grooming care.
details: This dual combo promotes beard growth while the Vitamin C serum brightens and hydrates skin, improving overall skin texture and health.

name: L'Oréal Men Expert Moisturizer
description: Hydrating moisturizer that fights dryness and keeps skin fresh all day.
details: Infused with active ingredients, this moisturizer combats dullness and energizes tired skin while providing 24-hour hydration.

name: Ustraa Hair Wax Strong Hold
description: Non-sticky hair wax with strong hold and matte finish.
details: Perfect for all hair types, this wax offers a long-lasting hold without making hair greasy or hard.

name: The Man Company Charcoal Soap
description: Charcoal soap bar that detoxifies skin and removes impurities.
details: This soap bar cleanses deep into the pores and removes oil and dirt, leaving your skin refreshed and healthy.

name: Park Avenue Luxury Grooming Kit (8 in 1)
description: All-in-one grooming kit with 8 essential tools for men.
details: Includes shaving essentials, beard oil, styling gel, body spray, and more — a complete package for modern grooming needs.

name: Beardo Ban the Tan Kit
description: Detan Facewash and Scrub kit enriched with coffee extracts and Vitamin E.
details: Specially crafted to remove tan and refresh dull skin, ideal as a gift hamper for men during special occasions.

name: The Man Company Charcoal Kit Set Of 6
description: Premium kit including body wash, shampoo, scrub, face wash, cleansing gel & soap.
details: An elite charcoal-based grooming set with six powerful skin-cleansing and hair-care products. Great for gifting and daily use.
